channel.title: 测试 on 个人笔记
channel.description: Recent content in 测试 on 个人笔记

item.title: 9中API测试方式
item.description: Explaining 9 types of API testing. 🔹 Smoke Testing This is done after API development is complete. Simply validate if the APIs are working and nothing breaks. 🔹 Functional Testing This creates a test plan based on the functional requirements and compares the results with the expected results. 🔹 Integration Testing This test combines several API calls to perform end-to-end tests. The intra-service communications and data transmissions are tested.
